body.name: DG64-00473A Stove Knobs for Samsung-Stainless Steel Gas Range Knobs,Top Burner Control Dial Knob Range Oven Replacement (5 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 15 mins
features: This stove knobs is compatible with Samsung Gas Range/ Oven/ Stove. Fit for models NX58H5600SS/AA-00, NX58H5600SS/AA-01, NX58H5600SS/AA-02, NX58H5600SS/AA-03, NX58H5600SS/AC-01, NX58H5600SS/AC-02, NX58H5650WS/AA-00, NX58H5650WS/AA-01, NX58H5650WS/AA-02, NX58F5700WS/AA-03, NX58J7750SS/AA-00, NX58J7750SS/AA-01, NX58J7750SS/AC, NX58K7850SS/AA-00, NX58K7850SS/AA-01, NX58K7850SS/AA-02, NX58M6850SS/AA-00, NX58M6850SS/AA-01.

Stainless steel knob surface with brushing process, more comfortable to use. DG64-00473A stove knob bottom is a metal heat insulation plate, double reinforced, better heat resistance. Metal ring in the middle of the dial, which strengthens the power protection and makes the knob more compact and sturdy. Samsung nx58h5600ss knob has better weight-bearing performance than the previous cheap plastic knob, it is heavier, less breakable, wearable and durable.

Our DG64-00473A stove knobs is made of high-quality stainless steel with higher efficiency, durability and the best quality to improve Longevity and comfortable experience，With quality that meets or exceeds OEM manufacturing requirements.

Using this samsung stove knob replacement can be easily installed in seconds. To replace the knobs,without any tools. Mainly slide the old knob directly out of the valve stem, and then slide the replacement knob back to the valve stem. Do not bend the knob up or down. This is the perfect choice for the price. If your stove is black, you will need DG64-00473B instead and this knob won't match your color.

If you have any questions before or after purchasing, please contact us through Amazon message, we will provide you with a satisfactory solution. We provided one-month unsatisfied replacement or refund, 12-month professional after-sale service.

New upgrade version The middle of the dial is made of new upgraded stainless steel metal ring, which strengthens the power protection and is stronger and more wear-resistant than the old plastic version, with better weight-bearing performance and not easy to break. Accurate size Strong rings to reinforce around the middle part of the knobs - kinda like a tight sleeve around them to ensure they can take heavy duty and won't be cracked easily. Size: 2.4 inch / 6 cm in diameter, 1.6 inch/ 4 cm in height. Package included 1x 5 PCS DG64-00473A Stove Knobs WARM NOTIC If your stove is black, you will need DG64-00473B instead and this knob won't match your color.

Warm Note： After using the range, stove or cooktop every time, it is better to clean the front panel.Use wet cloth and mild soapy water or a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water. Rinse with clean water and dry with a soft cloth.Don't use abrasive cleaners, strong liquid cleaners, plastic pads or oven cleaners on manifold panels. They will damage the surface of your range, stove or cooktop.

reviews.reviewText: I used to buy the Samsung version of these and they would last a year max and they all break. These are a fifth of the price and lasted several years. They look perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very needed and useful.
reviews.reviewText: I loved the shiney silvery/golden color and great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These knobs are not bad, They are stainless steel instead of my original brushed and top side is not as nice as the original ones. I rather have no red maker like the originals but not a big deal. They do fit as needed, a little more flush. I did have one knob come in with the insert not fully in place and had to use a hammer to fix, afterwards all fit as it should. I would recommend these as replacements if they fit your need.

reviews.reviewText: All the old knobs split as there is no reinforcement of the plastic section that slides onto the shaftNew knobs are a perfect match with a metal collar reinforcing the plastic section that slides onto the valve shaft.
